DialogueOption.Text: Hey, do you know where Hornfels is?

Dialogue.Page: Didn't Slate tell you? Hornfels headed over to the <color=orange>Radio Tower</color> just a minute ago. Something about the statue opening its eyes reminding them of something? I dunno.
You should have seen them run out of here, though. It was wild. I had no idea Hornfels still had that in them.
